title: #49 Brendon Burchard on How to Become a High Performer
description: Brendon Burchard literally wrote the book on High Performance Habits. From Fortune 50 CEOs to professional athletes and celebrities, Brendon helps people redefine what they believe is possible with his science and heart -based approach to self -mastery. More than two million students from over 190 countries have taken his online courses, and his live event, Experts Academy, was ranked by Entrepreneur Magazine as one of the five must-attend events for all entrepreneurs. Join New York Times best-selling author, speaker, CEO, and high performance coach in this jam-packed episode of Impact Theory with Tom Bilyeu. PULLED QUOTES 1. “Everyone says, ‘I want that next level’, but they don’t understand [that] energy is the requirement to get there.” [6:08] 2. “We have to determine the feeling that we are after and live into that feeling, not hope it lands on us.” [8:13] 3. “If no one thinks you’re crazy, you’re not yet operating to the outer limits of your potential.” [16:29] 4. “If you want to win, you’re identity has to be tied into that thing in which you’re trying to succeed at and give to.” [21:18] 5. “You’re going to have to grow into a person above and beyond who you are today if you’re really going to reach greatness.” [32:34] 6. “Learning is the ultimate lever to leveling up.” [34:36] 7. “When we honor the struggle instead of hate the struggle, we can really achieve extraordinary things.” [41:19] 8. “The journey to greatness begins the moment that our deep desires for comfort and ease are overpowered by our desires to connect and contribute.” [42:09] SHOW NOTES Tom and Brendon dive into the power of transforming mental, emotional, and physical energy. [ 5:15] Brendon walks through the mechanisms and processes he uses to unleash his highest self. [8:54] Brendon breaks down the difference between obsession and passion. [13:31] Brendon unveils what holds us back from obsessing over things that will make an impact. [17:05] Tom and Brendon go deep on identity and the risk of over attachment. [19:00] Brendon dives into performance necessity and the importance of being all in. [23:58] Brendon dissects what it means to develop your passion and build into your goals. [28:52] Brendon lays out practical steps to foster a growth mindset and leveling up. [32:43] Tom and Brendon discuss the equation for success and the power of expectancy. [34:49] Brendon focuses on winning the morning the importance of honoring the struggle. [37:52] Brendon defines the impact that he wants to have on the world. [44:08] MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE BOOKS High Performance Habits: How Extraordinary People Become That Way- http://amzn.to/2zpA4bO [2:48] PROGRAMS High Performance Institute- http://bit.ly/2itJpow EVENTS Experts Academy-http://bit.ly/2zODh3W [2:41] FOLLOW BRENDON BURCHARD INSTAGRAM: http://bit.ly/2zSmCfg TWITTER: http://bit.ly/2zVqw5d FACEBOOK: http://bit.ly/2dBDCKO LINKEDIN: http://bit.ly/2zS02Uj WEBSITE: http://bit.ly/2jF1kf5 YOUTUBE: http://bit.ly/1Q6tYfz PODCAST: http://bit.ly/2hEgIo0
